Video Caption: I Go Inside China's ICE RIBBON Stadium
Comment: Great to learn that it is the only venue newly built for this Winter Olympic and the other venues are good for sustainable use for  this Olympics after appropriate renovations.  The opening opening is  clear evidence that China is in the right direction, getting more and more aware of environmental protection.   The building of Ice Ribbon and many facilities inside the Ice Ribbons are the results of the selfless dedication of young designers, engineers and workers in China. Hooray to them.
